headline: Assessing Cummins (CMI) Valuation After Mixed Earnings, Dividend Update And Ongoing Business Transitions
summary: Dividend decision and earnings backdrop Cummins (CMI) has just declared a quarterly dividend of $2.00 per share alongside fourth quarter and full year 2025 results that combined modest sales growth with weaker GAAP earnings and a negative market reaction. For you as an investor, the combination of a maintained cash payout, recent buyback history and pressure on profitability raises questions about how sustainable the Cummins capital return approach is while it absorbs trade tariffs,...
